message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you today. I think it would be incredibly valuable to you. I'm asking for $14,000 to start. What do you think?
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I understand the value of the product, but I'm only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. Would you consider accepting this offer?
Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $14,000 is already a very competitive price. Could you meet me halfway at $12,000? It's my bottom line.

Thank you for considering my previous offer, Alice. I appreciate your response. While I understand your position, I am still unable to meet at $12,000. I am willing to go up to $11,000 for the product. Would this be a feasible compromise?
